title: How eliminating fees for probation and parole impacts those leaving incarceration
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In July, Massachusetts eliminated fees associated with probation or parole. We speak with an advocate who's worked on probation and parole initiatives, as well as someone on parole, about what that changes means for those leaving incarceration.
itunes:author: WBUR
